title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in a table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The value new Date("3/2/2005") should be accepted as a valid input in the table filter.
SR:
1. Create a new data source and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the 'Value1' field of the filter, enter new Date("3/2/2005").
